Description: Enabling modern authentication for Exchange Online ensures strong authentication mechanisms are used when establishing sessions between email clients and Exchange Online.
Remediation: 1. Run the Microsoft Exchange Online PowerShell Module. > 2. Connect to Exchange Online using Connect-ExchangeOnline. > 3. Run the following PowerShell command: Set-OrganizationConfig -OAuth2ClientProfileEnabled $True

References.Text: Enable or disable modern authentication for Outlook in Exchange Online
